inclusion.criterion: Inflammatory bowel disease diagnosed at least 3 months ago
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Failure of either one immunomodulator of at least 3 months duration, or TNF inhibitor
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Currently active disease, partial Mayo score ≥4 for ulcerative colitis, or CDAI ≥200
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No antibiotic treatment in the last 6 months
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Negative C. difficile toxins (A and B)
exclusion.label: met
